install.name: JA News 1.3.1
install.author: JoomlArt.com
install.copyright: (C) 2007 Open Source Matters. All rights reserved.
install.description: JA News module version 1.3.1 come with JA Teline II. JA News Frontpage should be installed to used with this module. JA News Frontpage is a part of JA News packages (JA News + JA News frontpage = JA News 1.3 and released with JA Teline II). For Userguide, please visit http://www.joomlart.com/forums/showthread.php?t=11946

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: hiddenClasses
param.label: Hidden Classes
param.description: Classes that have property such display: none. Separated by |

param.name: ordering
param.label: Article Order
param.description: Order by date or by ordering

param.name: catorsec
param.label: Group by Category or Section
param.description: Group by Category or Section. Section recommended

param.name: catid
param.label: Category (Section) ID
param.description: Selects items from a specific Category (Section) or set of Categories (Sections), line by line. In each line, put ID and color theme, seperated by a : (Example of settings in Demo site: 13:red 14:orange 8:deepblue 12:cyan 5:green 9:pink 11:lime)

param.name: width
param.label: Image Width
param.description: Fixed width of the image in pixel (set to -1 if you want to leave the image's default size

param.name: height
param.label: Image Height
param.description: Fixed height of the image in pixel (set to -1 if you want to leave the image's default size

param.name: cols
param.label: Columns
param.description: How many columns per row (Set to zero if you want to disable other news items)

param.name: showreadmore
param.label: Show Readmore
param.description: Show/Hide Readmore button on category news
